text:
I installed Apache 2.0.39 under Windows 2000. Before, I had 2.0.36 working 
perfectly with PHP 4.2.1. When I installed 2.0.39, it can't load. I get this 
error :
"apache: module "c:\php4build\snap\sapi\apache2filter\sapi_apache2.c" is not 
compatible with this version of Apache. Please contact the vendor for the 
correction version."
I copied my old configuration files, didn't help... still the same thing. But 
the directory c:\php4build\... has never existed.

I really don't understand the bug...
creator: hubweb@hotmail.com
jwoolley@apache.org
text: It's simple - PHP 4.2.1 is not compatible with Apache 2.0.39.  You'll need to get a newer release of from the PHP group when it becomes available.
